OZWEEGO SHOES

ULTRA-COMFORTABLE SHOES THAT PLAY UP THE VIBES.

The '90s anti-conformist approach to fashion defined the era. Rules? Question them. Twist them. See if they break. The adidas OZWEEGO Shoes did exactly that back in the day, and this modern version keeps the same energy flowing. Bold midsole lines pay homage to the icons. The luxe, material-mix upper rides on plush cushioning to keep you moving in comfort all day long.

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Snug fit
  • Lace closure
  • Mesh, suede and TPU upper
  • Hugs the foot
  • Adiprene cushioning
  • Rubber outsole
  • Product colour: Hazy Green / Hazy Green / Cream White
  • Product code: GW2543

Scroll horizontally to see more.

IN BETWEEN SIZES?

For tight fit, go one size down.

For loose fit, go one size up.

HOW TO MEASURE

Follow these easy steps to get the right size. For the best fit, measure your feet at the end of the day.

  1. Step on a piece of paper with your heel slightly touching a wall behind.
  2. Mark the end of your longest toe on the paper (you might need a friend to help you) and measure from the wall to the marking.
  3. Do the same for the other foot and compare measurements with our size chart to get the right size.
NOT THE RIGHT SIZE OR COLOUR?

No problem, we offer free size exchanges for 60 days and we have free return service.
